00007 #ifndef MECAB_MUTEX_H
00008 #define MECAB_MUTEX_H
00009 
00010 #include <string>
00011 #include "common.h"
00012 #include "string_buffer.h"
00013 
00014 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00015 #include "config.h"
00016 #endif
00017 
00018 #ifndef MECAB_WITHOUT_MUTEX_LOCK
00019 #ifdef HAVE_PTHREAD_H
00020 #define _USE_PTHREAD_MUTEX
00021 #include <pthread.h>
00022 #else
00023 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00024 #ifdef HAVE_WINDOWS_H
00025 #include <windows.h>
00026 #endif
00027 #define _USE_WINDOWS_MUTEX
00028 #endif
00029 #endif
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 namespace MeCab {
00033 
00034 class Mutex {
00035  private:
00036 #ifdef _USE_PTHREAD_MUTEX
00037   pthread_mutex_t mutex_;
00038 #else
00039 #ifdef _USE_WINDOWS_MUTEX
00040   CRITICAL_SECTION mutex_;
00041 #endif
00042 #endif
00043   whatlog what_;
00044 
00045  public:
00046   const char *what() { return what_.str(); }
00047 
00048 #ifdef _USE_PTHREAD_MUTEX
00049   Mutex()       { pthread_mutex_init(&mutex_, NULL); }
00050   virtual ~Mutex() {  pthread_mutex_destroy(&mutex_); }
00051   void lock()   { pthread_mutex_lock(&mutex_); }
00052   void unlock() { pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex_); }
00053 #else
00054 #ifdef _USE_WINDOWS_MUTEX
00055   Mutex()       { InitializeCriticalSection(&mutex_); }
00056   virtual ~Mutex() {
00057     unlock();
00058     DeleteCriticalSection(&mutex_);
00059   }
00060   void lock()   { EnterCriticalSection(&mutex_); }
00061   void unlock() { LeaveCriticalSection(&mutex_); }
00062 #else
00063   Mutex() { WHAT("this machine does not support mutex"); }
00064   virtual ~Mutex() {}
00065   void lock()   {}
00066   void unlock() {}
00067 #endif
00068 #endif
00069 };
00070 }
00071 
00072 #endif
